page.title: 14PRIMARY MUSIC WORKSHOP 1985
page.content: On the 3rd and 4th of July six schools went to a music workshop at Joseph Rowntree's School, New Earswick. The schools involved were Headlands,New Earswick,Robert Wilkinson at Strensall,Skelton,Usher Lane and Wigginton Primary. We shared a coach with Skelton school. Radio York sponsored us,they paid for our concert,music and transport.It was Radio York's second birthday on the 4th July so they recorded our workshop and concert to play on the radio. We played instruments and learned new songs for a concert in the evening. At the concert 200 children took part and there were 350 people in the audience.We enjoyed it very much.
